sentences.en: Affiliation refers to your relationship to the operational object being represented.
sentences.cn: 相互关系是指你与正被表述的行动目标的关系.

sentences.en: But fire control and sensors are almost fully operational.
sentences.cn: 但点火控制和感应系统已经可以运转自如了.

sentences.en: Indicators are metrics used to evaluate performance against tactical and operational goals.
sentences.cn: 指标是衡量标准来评价业绩,战术和作战目标.

sentences.en: It is the operational bible of the news organization.
sentences.cn: 它是新闻机构行动的权威性指令.

sentences.en: operational activities/costs/difficulties
sentences.cn: 营运上的活动 / 成本 / 困难

sentences.en: Operational Research is a newly emerging subject.
sentences.cn: 运筹学是一门新兴的学科.

sentences.en: Our main offices are now fully operational.
sentences.cn: 我们的总部现已全面投入运营。

sentences.en: Patco accepted full responsibility for operational management.
sentences.cn: 帕科同意全面负责经营管理。

sentences.en: Phone operational state; idle, establishing line, online data and online command.
sentences.cn: 包括电话操作状态; 空闲 、 建立连线 、 通话以及通话命令.

sentences.en: The airport did not become operational until May.
sentences.cn: 机场到五月才可使用.

sentences.en: The boat should be operational by this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午这艘船应该可以使用了。

sentences.en: The formal demonstration of system acceptability to obtain authorization for its operational use.
sentences.cn: 为使系统获准投入运行性使用,对系统的可接受性所做的正式演示.

sentences.en: The new airport is now fully operational .
sentences.cn: 新机场现在可全面投入运营。

sentences.en: The new system became operational in March.
sentences.cn: 新的系统于3月份启用。

sentences.en: The newly designed rice transplanter will soon be operational.
sentences.cn: 新设计的插秧机不久即可使用.

sentences.en: The operational stability is design goal of the loader's working device too.
sentences.cn: 作业平稳性是装载机工作装置设计的目标之一.

sentences.en: The telephone is fully operational again.
sentences.cn: 电话又完全可以使用了.

sentences.en: The whole system will be fully operational by December 1995.
sentences.cn: 整个系统到1995年12月将可全面投入使用。

sentences.en: To make a facility of functional unit operational.
sentences.cn: 使设施或功能单元[操作部件]可运行.

sentences.en: Yet, ironically , there was seldom any difficulty in getting money for non - operational improvements.
sentences.cn: 然而, 令人啼笑皆非的是,要钱改善与飞行操作无关的项目, 却是很少碰上什么困难的.

trans.tran_cn: 即可使用的，（用于）操作的，经营的，军事行动的
trans.tran_en: working and ready to be used
